alert.note: Alert for Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ogle and northwestern Lee Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shannon to 7 miles north of Sterling. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Mount Morris, Polo, Forreston, Leaf River, Nelson, Woodland Shores, Adeline, Baileyville and Woosung. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 45 and 49. This includes... Castle Rock State Park, Sauk Valley College, and White Pines State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
